TopicTitle: Papers, Please is now in preorder! Glory to Arstotzka!

Articles.Content:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/239030/

I know there are other Kerbalmen that enjoy this game. Show your pride!

[APPROVED]

GLORY TO ARSTOTZKA!

GLORY TO ARSTOTZKA!

Scott Manley has some videos on that game.
I saw the NerdCubed version of that game. It's not bad. Looks like a Gameboy game with those graphics.

GLORY TO ASTOTZKA! <Salute>

I love that game, saw NerdCubed play it, and decided to try it myself. Quite fun...till you get to the level where you have to do full body scans, which includes nudity.

...which includes nudity.

It's a bunch of cartoons.

You're not going to hell for playing a game.
You just dont know the right games for that... ;P

GLORY TO ASTOTZKA! <Salute>

I love that game, saw NerdCubed play it, and decided to try it myself. Quite fun...till you get to the level where you have to do full body scans, which includes nudity.

Apparently you can turn the nudity off anyway, at least in the full version.

And Yeah I think I will be getting it.

I wanted to play it

I downloaded the beta and couldn't play because I need a "opengl 2.0 supporting graphics card".

I wonder why a pixelated game needs opengl 2.0...

"Papers, Please" has been released!

Glory to Arstotzka!

Really good game considering there's not much to it. Played it off the back of watching Scott Manley play it.

G.
